Caltrops.name: Caltrops
Caltrops.description: A caltrop is a four-pronged iron spike crafted so that one prong faces up no matter how the caltrop comes to rest. You scatter caltrops on the ground in the hope that your enemies step on them or are at least forced to slow down to avoid them. One 2-pound bag of caltrops covers an area 5 feet square.

Candle.name: Candle
Candle.effect: Provide some light in a small area. Burn for 1 hour.
Candle.description: A candle dimly illuminates a 5-foot radius and burns for 1 hour.

Chain.name: Chain
Chain.effect: Can be used in various specific situations.
Chain.description: Chain has hardness 10 and 5 hit points. It can be burst with a DC 26 Strength check.

Crowbar.name: Crowbar
Crowbar.effect: Can be used in a fight as improvised weapon, or used in specific situations.
Crowbar.description: A crowbar grants a +2 circumstance bonus on Strength checks made for such purposes. If used in combat, treat a crowbar as a one-handed improvised weapon that deals bludgeoning damage equal to that of a club of its size.

Flint and Steel.name: Flint and Steel
Flint and Steel.effect: Can be used to light a fire.
Flint and Steel.description: Lighting a torch with flint and steel is a full-round action, and lighting any other fire with them takes at least that long.

Grappling Hook.name: Grappling Hook
Grappling Hook.effect: If you know how to use a rope, can be used to access high ground or to grapple a foe.
Grappling Hook.description: Throwing a grappling hook successfully requires a Use Rope check (DC 10, +2 per 10 feet of distance thrown).

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.effect: Can be used in a fight as improvised weapon, or used in specific situations.
Hammer.description: If a hammer is used in combat, treat it as a one-handed improvised weapon that deals bludgeoning damage equal to that of a spiked gauntlet of its size.

Ink.name: Ink
Ink.effect: Used to write or teint stuffs.
Ink.description: This is black ink. You can buy ink in other colors, but it costs twice as much.

Jug, Clay.name: Jug, Clay
Jug, Clay.effect: Fragile container for holding up to 1 gallon of liquid.
Jug, Clay.description: This basic ceramic jug is fitted with a stopper and holds 1 gallon of liquid.

Lamp, Common.name: Lamp, Common
Lamp, Common.effect: Provide some light in a medium area. Burn for 6h.
Lamp, Common.description: A lamp clearly illuminates a 15-foot radius, provides shadowy illumination out to a 30-foot radius, and burns for 6 hours on a pint of oil. You can carry a lamp in one hand.

Lantern, Bullseye.name: Lantern, Bullseye
Lantern, Bullseye.effect: Provide a bright light in cone shape. Burn for 6h.
Lantern, Bullseye.description: A bullseye lantern provides clear illumination in a 60-foot cone and shadowy illumination in a 120-foot cone. It burns for 6 hours on a pint of oil. You can carry a bullseye lantern in one hand.

Lantern, Hooded.name: Lantern, Hooded
Lantern, Hooded.effect: Provide a bright light in a large area. Burn for 6h.
Lantern, Hooded.description: A hooded lantern clearly illuminates a 30-foot radius and provides shadowy illumination in a 60-foot radius. It burns for 6 hours on a pint of oil. You can carry a hooded lantern in one hand.

Lock (very simple).name: Lock (very simple)
Lock (very simple).effect: Can open a very simple lock.
Lock (very simple).description: The DC to open a lock with the Open Lock skill depends on the locks quality: simple (DC 20), average (DC 25), good (DC 30), or superior (DC 40).

Lock (average).name: Lock (average)
Lock (average).description: The DC to open a lock with the Open Lock skill depends on the locks quality: simple (DC 20), average (DC 25), good (DC 30), or superior (DC 40).

Lock (good).name: Lock (good)
Lock (good).effect: Can open a most of the lock you will find in a city.
Lock (good).description: The DC to open a lock with the Open Lock skill depends on the locks quality: simple (DC 20), average (DC 25), good (DC 30), or superior (DC 40).

Lock (amazing).name: Lock (amazing)
Lock (amazing).effect: Can probably open a throne room.
Lock (amazing).description: The DC to open a lock with the Open Lock skill depends on the locks quality: simple (DC 20), average (DC 25), good (DC 30), or superior (DC 40).

Manacles.name: Manacles
Manacles.effect: Can be used to entrave someone.
Manacles.description: Manacles can bind a Medium creature. A manacled creature can use the Escape Artist skill to slip free (DC 30, or DC 35 for masterwork manacles). Breaking the manacles requires a Strength check (DC 26, or DC 28 for masterwork manacles). Manacles have hardness 10 and 10 hit points

Manacles, masterwork.name: Manacles, masterwork
Manacles, masterwork.effect: Can be used to entrave someone with great strength.
Manacles, masterwork.description: Manacles can bind a Medium creature. A manacled creature can use the Escape Artist skill to slip free (DC 30, or DC 35 for masterwork manacles). Breaking the manacles requires a Strength check (DC 26, or DC 28 for masterwork manacles). Manacles have hardness 10 and 10 hit points

Oil.name: Oil
Oil.effect: Can be used to refuell a lantern for 6h.
Oil.description: A pint of oil burns for 6 hours in a lantern. You can use a flask of oil as a splash weapon. Use the rules for alchemists fire, except that it takes a full round action to prepare a flask with a fuse. Once it is thrown, there is a 50% chance of the flask igniting successfully. You can pour a pint of oil on the ground to cover an area 5 feet square, provided that the surface is smooth. If lit, the oil burns for 2 rounds and deals 1d3 points of fire damage to each creature in the area.

Rope, Hempen.name: Rope, Hempen
Rope, Hempen.effect: A standard rope that can be used for various purposes.
Rope, Hempen.description: This rope has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 23 Strength check.

Rope, Silk.name: Rope, Silk
Rope, Silk.effect: A solid rope that can be used for various purposes.
Rope, Silk.description: This rope has 4 hit points and can be burst with a DC 24 Strength check. It is so supple that it provides a +2 circumstance bonus on Use Rope checks.

Spyglass.name: Spyglass
Spyglass.effect: Can be used to clearly see distant objects.
Spyglass.description: Objects viewed through a spyglass are magnified to twice their size.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.effect: Burn for 1h and provide a bright light in a medium area.
Torch.description: A torch burns for 1 hour, clearly illuminating a 20-foot radius and providing shadowy illumination out to a 40-foot radius. If a torch is used in combat, treat it as a one-handed improvised weapon that deals bludgeoning damage equal to that of a gauntlet of its size, plus 1 point of fire damage.

Vial.name: Vial
Vial.effect: Can contain up to 1 ounce of liquid.
Vial.description: A vial holds 1 ounce of liquid. The stoppered container usually is no more than 1 inch wide and 3 inches high.
